__e: Help me find this girl with the magic wand.
You think that I just have a magic wand that will make this go away?
Not until I check you with my magic wand, you ain't.
And now he gets to die!
I know it might seem like I treat you badly... and that I boss you around and I don't listen to you enough, but you have no idea how much you mean to me, how you've changed my life.
And after, I don't know, ten dodges or something... when I was eight or nine... he gave me the baton, and that's the reason why I'm here.
Plus, you know I've always wanted to learn how to use a dowsing rod.
Is there anything to drink in this place or do I have to go to my car and get my divining rod?
I will not be bossed around by someone 40 years younger than me.
